title: PJM Hourly Energy Consumption - 50 Percent
description: This is a variation of the PJM Hourly Energy Consumptiondataset. In this variation, 50% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. This dataset contains data related to hourly level energy consumption in regions served by PJM Interconnection LLC (PJM).

forecastTarget.name: Energy_Consumption_GW
forecastTarget.description: Target variable representing energy consumption in gigawatt.
